page.title: 14The Local Paper
page.content: The Nor'Lye News is a news-sheet produced every other Tuesday for the people who live in North Leigh.It tells them about everyting that is going to happen in the coming weeks.For example, the Football Club Dance,the Womens Institute Mini-Show and the Todeller's Nursery.In the June edition number 143,we can read about the Flower and Music Festival at St Mary's Church and the Horticultural Society Annual Outing to Weston House.In the middle of the news sheet we can read the Vicar's letter.He is telling everybody about the message of Whitsun.In this edition we can also read about the Girl guides 75th Anniversary and the Cub Scouts advertising for boys of eight or above to join the pack.There are also many adverts in the paper.
